problem.title: Sound familiar?
points: Your website looks like it's from 2015
The ad agency blames the website. The web agency blames the ads.
You pay for "marketing" but don't know what exactly
You want to change something on the site and wait 2 weeks
problem.solution_text: One company. Website, SEO and ads. If something doesn't work — it's our problem, not yours.

services.title: What we do
services.subtitle: We focus on three things — and do them well.

seo.title: SEO
seo.description: Be visible on Google for your customers

step1.title: Conversation
step1.description: Tell us about your business. We'll understand your goals and prepare a quote.

step2.title: Execution
step2.description: We design and build the site. You approve, we deploy. Done in 2-3 weeks.

step3.title: Results
step3.description: We launch SEO and ads. We monitor, optimize, and report.

about.title: About us
about.description: We build websites that work. We're not a big agency with a conference room and account manager. We're two people who get things done.
about.contact_line: You call — Karol answers. Something breaks — Wouter fixes it. No passing between departments. No waiting for "team response".

karol.bio: Business Analyst at Colliers. Will understand your business and take care of every detail.

wouter.bio: Senior developer with experience in e-commerce, AI and web applications. Your site in good hands.

point1.title: Everything in one place
point1.description: Website, SEO, ads. No unnecessary middlemen.

point3.title: Talk to people, not a company
point3.description: You know us by name, we know your business.

footer.tagline: Website, SEO and ads. One team, one goal.

hero.headline: Services
hero.subheadline: Website, SEO and ads. Everything you need in one place.

website_detail.title: Websites
website_detail.intro: Modern websites that attract customers and sell.
features: Custom design tailored to your brand
Responsive design that works on all devices
Speed optimization — loads in under 3 seconds
process_steps: Building the site with preview access

seo_detail.title: SEO
seo_detail.intro: Be visible where your customers are searching.
features: Full technical audit of your site
Monthly reports with visibility and rankings
seo_detail.timeline_note: SEO is a marathon, not a sprint. Expect first results after 3-6 months of consistent work.

ads_detail.title: Google Ads
ads_detail.intro: Ads that reach the right people at the right time.
features: Campaign strategy tailored to your goals
ads_detail.budget_note: Add advertising budget to management cost. We recommend minimum 2000 PLN monthly.

questions.q: How much does a website cost?
questions.a: Prices start from 8000 PLN for a business card website. Exact pricing depends on project scope — number of pages, features and integrations. We'll quote your project for free.

questions.q: How long does it take to build a website?
questions.a: A standard business website takes 2-3 weeks from design approval. More complex projects may take 4-6 weeks.

questions.q: Can I edit the website myself?
questions.a: Yes, we provide an admin panel and train you on how to use it. You'll be able to change texts, photos and add new content yourself.

questions.q: When will I see SEO results?
questions.a: First visible results appear after 3-6 months. SEO is a long-term investment, but it brings stable and growing results.

questions.q: What budget do I need for Google Ads?
questions.a: We recommend minimum 2000 PLN monthly for the ad budget alone. Management cost is additional. Smaller budgets are possible, but results will be proportionally smaller.
For SEO and Google Ads we recommend minimum 6 months to see real results. But we don't lock in clients — if you're not satisfied, you can leave with one month notice.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy policy describes how SwiftBuild collects, uses and protects personal data of our website users.

data_controller.title: Data Controller
data_controller.content: The controller of your personal data is SwiftBuild. For matters related to data protection, you can contact us at: kontakt@swiftbuild.services

data_collection.title: What data we collect
data_collection.content: We collect data you provide directly through the contact form: name, surname, email address, phone number and message content. Additionally, we automatically collect technical data: IP address, browser type, visit time.

data_purpose.title: How we use your data
data_purpose.content: We use data to: respond to your inquiries, prepare cooperation offers, deliver services, and for analytical purposes (improving website performance).

data_sharing.title: Who we share data with
data_sharing.content: We don't sell or rent your data. We may share data with trusted technology partners (hosting, email) only to the extent necessary to provide services.

data_retention.title: How long we keep data
data_retention.content: We store data for the period necessary to achieve the purposes for which it was collected, or until consent is withdrawn, and then for the period required by law.

your_rights.title: Your rights
your_rights.content: You have the right to: access your data, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability and to object. To exercise these rights, contact us by email.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies for analytical and functional purposes. You can manage cookies in your browser settings.

changes.title: Policy changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to update this policy. We will inform you of significant changes by updating the last modified date at the top of the page.
